description: Lotus Domino SMTP server 4.63 through 5.08 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) by forging an email message with the sender as bounce@[127.0.0.1] (localhost), which causes Domino to enter a mail loop.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2001-0520
